longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 30 days beyond the period of intended
  stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a Macao (SAR China) Identity Card.
- Holders of a Visit Permit to Hong Kong (SAR China) for
  residents of Macao (SAR China) issued by Macao (SAR China).
- Holders of a PRC Travel Document (Lu Xing Zheng).  
- Holders of a Hong Kong (SAR China) Permanent Identity Card. 
- Holders of an "Entry and Exit Permit for Traveling to and
  from Taiwan" issued by China (People's Rep.), containing a
  valid "Exit endorsement to Taiwan". 
- Holders of an "Exit-entry Permit for Traveling to and from
  Hong Kong and Macao" (EEP) issued by China (People's Rep.),
  containing a valid Exit endorsement to Macao (SAR China).
- Holders of a Macao (SAR China) Travel Permit.
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for Holders of a Macao (SAR China)
passport.
Visa required, except for Holders of a Macao (SAR China)
Identity Card.
Visa required, except for Holders of a Visit Permit to Hong
Kong (SAR China) for residents of Macao (SAR China) issued by
Macao (SAR China).
Visa required, except for Holders of a Macao (SAR China)
Travel Permit.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 1 year: 
 - for holders of a Hong Kong Permanent Identity Card. 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 7 days for passengers
in transit to/from a third country, holding an onward ticket
and all documents required for next destination: 
 - for holders of passports issued by China (People's Rep.); 
 - for holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) passports; 
 - for holders of a PRC Travel Document (Lu Xing Zheng). 
Visa required, except for Holders of an "Exit-entry Permit for
Traveling to and from Hong Kong and Macao" (EEP) issued by
China (People's Rep.), containing a valid Exit endorsement to
Macao (SAR China). 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 7 days for holders of
an "Entry and Exit Permit for Traveling to and from Taiwan"
(pink/purple booklet) issued by China (People's Rep.),
containing a valid "Exit endorsement to Taiwan", in transit
to/from Chinese Taipei. 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds (at
  least MOP 5000.-) to cover their stay and documents required
  for their next destination. 
- Visitors can apply for a visa extension 5 days before the
  expiry of their original visa. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
